name: Candy Girl: Gingerbread Maze
description:
Collect all the sweets and bonuses in randomly generated gingerbread mazes. Avoid the evil witches and bloodthirsty wolves. Take coffee before the level and make the biggest combo.

FEATURES

• Try to collect the largest number of candies at random pixel style levels
• Discover and upgrade new heroes for the collected candies
• The game is fully offline.
• Accessible to the everyone gameplay
• Pleasant soothing 8-bit music
• Use a coffee boost to escape from traps!
• The main thing here: the competent passage of the maze will allow you to score the most points!
• Surpass yourself and get to the highest level.
